skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Cooking Basics will provide you with the basics to start your adventure with cooking. From how to cook rice, or can I re-use pasta water, to how to press tofu, you will find tips here that will make cooking easier for you. The daily updates from ChatAboutFood will also help you prepare delicious and healthy meals faster.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
